thread.title: Lois Heath
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Lois Heath

author: Lois Heath
title: Lois Heath
text:
From my sales people, Mark Wagner and Chris Zoldos to the delivery men, it was a great experience. Very personal and highly efficient.
Everything they said about following up on the delivery was spot on. Would highly recommend Gardner-White to everyone.
It was an awesome experience!!!
